page.title: 20The Authors, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: This Domesday block has been surveyed by the Junior children of {Wickhambreaux School.}We are a primary school, taking children from 5 to 11 years. There are at present 60 children, a headteacher and two assistant teachers. The two{junior {classes}surveyed our area by walking across every kilometre square. The older junior class recorded the land cover, and the{younger class}counted all other amenities.{The children of {class 3}wrote the text pages, they are:-{ {Jessica Thom, Andrea Painter, {Elizabeth Knowles, Catherine Croud, {Katherine Lane, Sally Twyman and {Odette Stankovic. Brett Hewer, Andrew {Waters, Bruce Goldin, Andrej Wout, {Matthew Alabaster, James Lewis, Robin {Thorn, Christopher Hoare, Simon Bates, {Ky Wilkinson and Richard Tyler.
